name: Nightline
desc: A student-run, overnight listening service providing confidential, non-advisory emotional support to UEA students facing personal challenges.

name: Advice SU
desc: Professional and student-led advice service offering confidential guidance on academic, financial, housing, and welfare issues to UEA students.

name: Student Counselling
desc: University-run counselling centre providing free one-to-one therapy, group workshops, and wellbeing resources to support student mental health.

name: Samaritans
desc: A 24/7 free helpline offering compassionate, non-judgmental emotional support and crisis intervention for anyone experiencing distress.

name: Accommodation
desc: Comprehensive guidance on on-campus and off-campus housing options, application processes, contracts, and tenancy support for students.

name: Report and Support
desc: Secure online platform for reporting harassment, bullying, discrimination, or safety concerns with confidential assistance from trained staff.

name: Security
desc: UEA Campus Security Team providing 24/7 patrols, emergency response, and safety advice to ensure a secure campus environment.

name: Housing Advice
desc: Specialist advice on tenancy rights, deposits, dispute resolution, and legal support for students living off campus.

name: Disability Advice
desc: Dedicated team offering academic adjustments, assistive technology, and advocacy for students with disabilities or long-term health conditions.

name: Counselling and mental health
desc: UEA SU service providing confidential counselling, mental health workshops, and signposting to professional wellbeing resources.

name: Clubs
desc: Directory of sports, hobby, and special interest clubs offering opportunities for social connection and skill development.

name: Societies
desc: Extensive list of academic, cultural, and recreational societies fostering community engagement and personal growth.

name: Learning Enhancement Team
desc: Campus service providing academic skills workshops, study planning, and one-to-one support to improve learning strategies.

name: Peer Assisted Learning Mentors
desc: Experienced student mentors facilitating group study sessions and one-to-one tutoring to reinforce course concepts.

name: Student Support Services
desc: Central hub offering information and guidance on wellbeing, finance, accommodation, and general student enquiries.

name: UEA Student Support Services
desc: Central support centre providing comprehensive advice on academic, personal, and welfare matters for UEA students.

name: Faith and Spirituality
desc: Interfaith chaplaincy and community network offering spiritual guidance, religious events, and a safe space for all beliefs.

name: The Cruse Bereavement Charity
desc: UK-wide charity providing bereavement counselling, support groups, and resources for individuals coping with loss.

name: The Good Grief Trust
desc: National network offering tailored bereavement support, information, and access to local grief services.

name: UEA Career Central
desc: Online portal providing CV feedback, career workshops, employer events, and internship opportunities.

name: UEA hardship fund
desc: Emergency financial grants to assist students facing acute hardship with essentials like food, rent, and study materials.

name: Access to Learning fund
desc: University-administered bursary supporting students with exceptional financial need to continue their studies.

name: UEA financial Advice
desc: Finance team offering budgeting advice, debt guidance, loan information, and financial wellbeing workshops.

name: UEA bursaries and scholarships
desc: Comprehensive overview of merit-based and need-based awards, scholarships, and bursary opportunities.

name: Sportspark
desc: State-of-the-art sports centre with gyms, swimming pools, courts, fitness classes, and wellness programmes.

name: Library
desc: UEA Library offering extensive collections, study spaces, online resources, and research support services.

name: Career Central
desc: Career development hub providing job listings, employer networking events, and personalised career guidance.

name: Study skills
desc: Workshops and resources focused on effective study techniques, time management, and academic writing.

name: NHS Choices
desc: Official NHS website offering reliable health information, symptom checkers, and guidance on treatments.

name: Medical centre
desc: On-campus NHS-affiliated medical centre providing GP services, vaccinations, and health consultations to students.

name: NHS Direct 111
desc: Free NHS non-emergency phone line and online service offering urgent medical advice and support.

name: FRANK
desc: Confidential drug information service providing facts, advice, and a helpline on substance use and harm reduction.

name: N&N hospital
desc: Norfolk & Norwich University Hospital offering acute, specialist, and emergency medical care.

name: Accommodation office
desc: UEA Accommodation Office handling room allocations, maintenance requests, and housing policy information.

name: UEA Dental Practice
desc: On-campus dental surgery offering NHS dental care, check-ups, and oral health advice to students.
